com.googlecode.aluminumproject.utilities

Class ReflectionUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.utilities.ReflectionUtilities

  • public class ReflectionUtilities
extends Object
    Offers utility methods related to reflection.

    • Method Detail

      • instantiate

        public static <T> T instantiate(String beanClassName,
                Class<T> type,
                ClassLoader loader)
                     throws AluminumException
        Finds a class by name and instantiates it.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the new bean
        Parameters:
        beanClassName - the name of the class to instantiate
        type - the type of the bean class (can be a supertype of the actual bean class)
        loader - the class loader to use
        Returns:
        a new instance of the class with the given name, cast to the given type
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when no class with the given name can be found, when the bean class is not assignable to the specified type, or when the bean class can't be initialised

      • instantiate

        public static <T> T instantiate(Class<T> beanClass,
                Object... arguments)
                     throws AluminumException
        Instantiates a class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the new object
        Parameters:
        beanClass - the class to instantiate
        arguments - arguments to construct the bean class with
        Returns:
        a new instance of the given class
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the class can't be instantiated

      • getPackageName

        public static String getPackageName(Class<?> type)
        Returns the name of a package in which a type resides.
        Parameters:
        type - the type to determine the package name of
        Returns:
        the name of type's package, the empty string if type is in the default package

      • wrapPrimitiveType

        public static Class<?> wrapPrimitiveType(Class<?> type)
        Determines the wrapper type for a primitive type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type to wrap
        Returns:
        the wrapped type for primitives (e.g. Boolean.class for Boolean.TYPE), the type itself for non-primitive types

      • isAbstract

        public static boolean isAbstract(Class<?> type)
        Determines whether a type is abstract or not.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of which needs to be found out whether it's abstract or not
        Returns:
        true if type is abstract, false otherwise

      • getFieldValue

        public static Object getFieldValue(Object bean,
                   String fieldName)
                            throws AluminumException
        Obtains the value of a field from a certain bean.
        Parameters:
        bean - the bean whose field value should be returned
        fieldName - the name of the field to retrieve
        Returns:
        the value of the field with the specified name from the given bean
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the field value can't be got

      • setFieldValue

        public static void setFieldValue(Object bean,
                 String fieldName,
                 Object value)
                          throws AluminumException
        Sets the value of a field on a certain bean.
        Parameters:
        bean - the bean whose field value should be set
        fieldName - the name of the field to set
        value - the new value for the field
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the field value can't be set

      • isGetter

        public static boolean isGetter(Method method)
                        throws AluminumException
        Determines whether a method is a getter, in the JavaBeans sense of the word.
        Parameters:
        method - the method to examine
        Returns:
        true if the method is a getter, false otherwise
        Throws:
        AluminumException - if no information about the method's declaring class can be found

      • getProperty

        public static <T> T getProperty(Object bean,
                Class<T> propertyType,
                String propertyName)
                     throws AluminumException
        Reads a property value from a bean.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the property
        Parameters:
        bean - the bean to get the property value from
        propertyType - the expected type of the property
        propertyName - the name of the property
        Returns:
        the value of the property on the given bean
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the property is of a different type than was expected, when the property is write-only, or when something goes wrong while getting the value

      • getNestedProperty

        public static <T> T getNestedProperty(Object bean,
                      Class<T> propertyType,
                      String propertyPath)
                           throws AluminumException
        Reads a (possibly nested) property value from a bean.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the last property in the chain
        Parameters:
        bean - the first bean in the chain
        propertyType - the expected type of the property
        propertyPath - the path to the property
        Returns:
        the value of the property
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the property is of a different type than was expected, when of the properties is write-only, or when something goes wrong while getting the value

      • isSetter

        public static boolean isSetter(Method method)
                        throws AluminumException
        Determines whether a method is a setter, in the JavaBeans sense of the word.
        Parameters:
        method - the method to examine
        Returns:
        true if the method is a setter, false otherwise
        Throws:
        AluminumException - if no information about the method's declaring class can be found

      • setProperty

        public static <T> void setProperty(Object bean,
                   Class<T> propertyType,
                   String propertyName,
                   T propertyValue)
                        throws AluminumException
        Sets a property value on a bean.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the property
        Parameters:
        bean - the bean to set the property value on
        propertyType - the expected type of the property
        propertyName - the name of the property
        propertyValue - the value to set
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the property is of a different type than was expected, when the property is read-only, or when something goes wrong while setting the value

      • getPropertyName

        public static String getPropertyName(Method method)
                              throws AluminumException
        Determines the name of a property based on its getter or setter.
        Parameters:
        method - the getter or setter of a property
        Returns:
        the name of the property that the given method is a getter or setter for
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the method is neither a getter nor a setter

      • getPropertyType

        public static Class<?> getPropertyType(Class<?> beanClass,
                       String propertyName)
                                throws AluminumException
        Determines the type of a property.
        Parameters:
        beanClass - the bean that contains the property
        propertyName - the name of the property to determine the type of
        Returns:
        the type of the property with the specified name on the given bean class
        Throws:
        AluminumException - when the bean class does not have a property with the given name
